title: Remove duplicate Contact link from header navigation

requirements.summary: Remove the duplicate 'Contact' text link from both desktop nav links and the mobile sheet menu while keeping the existing 'Contact Us' header button as the sole header CTA to /contact.
acceptanceCriteria: On desktop header, there is no separate text nav link labeled "Contact" if the "Contact Us" button is present.
On mobile header, the slide-out menu does not list a separate "Contact" link if the "Contact Us" button is present.
Navigating to /contact is still possible via the remaining header contact call-to-action.
No other header navigation items are removed or renamed.

file_operations.description: Update the shared header navItems list to remove the '/contact' item labeled 'Contact' so it no longer renders in the desktop link list or the mobile sheet menu, while preserving the existing 'Contact Us' button link to '/contact'. Ensure no other nav items are changed, and do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
